_meta.title: Money Making Guides | Profitable PokeMMO Gym Strategies | Team Synergy
_meta.description: Master PokeMMO money earning with comprehensive gym rerun guides including 6 Pillars, 7 Hells, Tempest Explosion and Prehistory 5 strategies.

_meta.title: Best Gym Rerun Strategies for PokeMMO | Money Making Teams | Team Synergy
_meta.description: Discover the most profitable gym rerun strategies in PokeMMO. Compare 6 Pillars, 7 Hells, Tempest Explosion, Prehistory 5, and Double Typhlosion methods with earnings and difficulty ratings.

_items.name: 6 Pillars
_items.description: 6 Pillars is an effective gym-rerun that makes a good amount of money and is easy to do, there is multiple difficulties to choose from, from simply switching lead Pokemon to switching held items/X Items with increasing money per hour for doing so. The team is relatively expensive, but due to how much it makes, you will make it back within a week or two of gym rerunning

_items.name: 7 Hells
_items.description: 7 Hells is easy to follow, and can be done without thinking; similar to 6 Pillars although more straightforward, with slightly less Money per hour, due to the simplicity it is designed around being able to easily do it on 2 accounts at once, if this is your goal, this will make more than 6 Pillars will.

_items.name: Tempest Explosion
_items.description: Tempest Explosion is known as the `Speedrunning` gym rerun, and is designed to be as fast as possible, this requires it to be much more focus intensive, but results in the most gym re runs per hour if done effectively, the team is very percise and the route requires item swaps, and focus, but if done correctly can reach up to 33 gyms per hour (pre string nerd)

_items.name: Prehistory 5
_items.description: This team is very good, similar speeds to 6 Pillars and 7 Hells but due to the team only having 5 Pokemon instead of 6 it allows you to level up an additional Pokemon alongside your gym reruns, meaning you can level up your Pokemon, or Level up Pokemon to sell for even more profits, meaning this can make even more money!

_items.name: Double Typhlosion
_items.description: This team is a Classic, and is probably the most well known Gym ReRun strategy on PokeMMO, due to how cheap and simple it is to do. Although nowadays due to the strings nerf it is a little outdated, although as it is very cheap, its a perfect gym re run to start of with until you can afford another one!
